basics.name: Tarun Telang
basics.label: Director of Software Engineering • Digital Transformation Leader • Platform Architect
basics.summary: Visionary engineering leader with 20+ years of experience driving digital transformation and leading high-performing teams. Proven track record of architecting scalable platforms, modernizing legacy systems, and delivering complex multi-year roadmaps. Expert in building enterprise-grade applications with strong focus on security, compliance (GDPR, PCI), and performance. Experienced in leading distributed teams, fostering innovation culture, and implementing 'You Build It, You Run It' operational models.

skills.name: Leadership & Strategy
keywords: You Build It You Run It (YBIYRI)

work.name: Lets Practice Academy
work.summary: Leading technology strategy and platform transformation for online learning ecosystem serving 100K+ professionals
highlights: Architected and launched enterprise-grade learning platform from ground up, scaling to serve 100K+ professionals with 99.9% uptime
Led digital transformation initiative modernizing legacy systems, improving platform performance by 60% and reducing operational costs by 40%
Developed and executed multi-year technology roadmap aligning platform capabilities with business objectives and user growth projections
Implemented 'You Build It, You Run It' operational model across 5 development teams, increasing deployment frequency by 300% and reducing MTTR by 50%
Built scalable microservices architecture with containerized deployments, supporting exponential user growth from hundreds to millions
Established comprehensive security framework ensuring compliance with data protection regulations (GDPR, CCPA) for global user base
Drove innovation culture through continuous learning programs and mentorship, enabling team members' transition to senior technical leadership roles

work.name: Highspot

highlights: Architected and delivered enterprise AI platform integrating with 4 major video platforms (Google, Zoom, Webex, RingCentral), processing 1M+ meetings monthly
Led cross-functional teams including product managers, data scientists, and external vendors to deliver complex AI/ML solutions on aggressive timelines
Designed scalable data ingestion pipeline handling high-volume meeting data with real-time processing and intelligent insights generation
Implemented enterprise-grade security measures and compliance frameworks ensuring data protection and privacy for Fortune 500 clients
Established continuous integration processes and automated testing frameworks, reducing deployment cycles from weeks to hours
Mentored junior engineers and data scientists, promoting culture of technical excellence and collaborative problem-solving
